version_description:
-Bite is now usable in PvP
-Full HP on levelup
-Minor bug fixes

Reduced app size
Balancing
Lots of bug fixes
Stomt updated
Unstuck-button in settings
Level cap at 60

Flee mechanic (%-based)
Daemon Call boosted (for hunting Brutals)
Respeccing!
Master of the Hunt questline properly finished
Balancing (shields and abilities)
Developer news in-game
Bug fixes

-All players get a 3X HP buff in PvP
-New potion!
-New Brutal (interactable)
-New itembonus: Spell Damage
-Level cap raised to 65
-Ability balancing
-Improvements to Bleed and Poison
-Combo and phased attacks are now dodge/blockable
-Stores will always restock if player is at max level
-Opt-in advertisements
-Reddit link added to start screen
-Fixed fatal crash for some devices
-Bug fixes (duh)

- Fixed app freeze in Easthaven
- Fixed main questline critical bug
- Several bugfixes
- Rebalancing of XP-requirement level 60+
- Support Vampire's Fall!

-Daily Brutals
-Minimap and tracking
-Revamped controls
-UI changes
-Bug fixes

-Cloud Saves
-Cosmetics
-Balancing
-Bug fixes

-Resiliance stat for PvP
-Balancing
-Reset Brutals mechanic
-Bug fixes
-Ads are removed

-Reset Brutals mechanic

-Ads are removed

-Resiliance stat for PvP
-Balancing
-Reset Brutals mechanic
-Bug fixes
-Ads are removed
-Potential crash fix for some devices

-Spanish language added (thanks José Navarro and Vicente Wang)
-Vampiric Touch fixes
-HP-gain from Quality slightly nerfed
-God of Brutal Cape fixed
-Some PvP errors fixed (thanks to Discord guys for testing)

-level cap increased to 70
-balancing
-bug fixes

-Shapeshifting
-Italian translation
-German expansion translation
-Lots of bug fixes

HUGE EXPANSION UPDATE
-New land: Denumald
-New quests
-New enemies
-New items
-New everything!

- NG+
- Stun in PvP now reduces focus instead of properly stunning in combo turns
- Item Augmentation
- Raised level cap to 75
- Ability to remove bloodstones from items
- Creature Lure potions available in stores
- Removed Armor Cap
- Less effect from bloodstones for stun, block chance, crit. dmg and crit. hit
- Displaying PvP-resilience values in PvP-menu
- Added  shield block resilience in PvP
- General bug fixes

-God of Brutal Cape fixed
-Some PvP errors fixed (thanks to Discord guys for testing)

*Minor hotfix, big update still being worked on*
-Performance optimization so chat works again despite heavy load

*Minor hotfix, big update still being worked on*
-Performance optimization so chat works again despite heavy load

*Minor update, big update still being worked on*
- You can now login with Apple
- Bug fixes

*Minor update, big update still being worked on*
- You can now login with Apple
- Bug fixes

1.6 - largest update so far
-Dungeons (including special event dungeons and an infinite dungeon)
-PvP Seasons (each season ends when Blood Moon ends)
-New high level skill tree with 25 new skills
-Set items added
-Lots of UI and FX polish
-New languages: Hungarian and Romanian

**HUGE CLANS UPDATE**
-Create and customize your own clan
-Participate in Rift Events for clans
-Upgrade your clan headquarters
-Level up your clan
-Compete with other clans
-Chat with other clan members
-New Wings
-Allow crafting everywhere in world
-Fast travel to Mor Nyth and Woodland Market added
-Bug fixes (surprise!)

===1.13 Patch notes===
===Features===
New Event: The Hunt
Alchemist form update
Active number of quests added
New phone Notifications added
Over encumbered system rework
===Tweaks and Fixes===
Deleting a character takes less time now
Fixed brutal catacombs spawning area
